description: A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Mus musculus, or a house mouse if you prefer English.

A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Rattus norvegicus, or a brown rat, specifically of the lab variety, if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Cavia porcellus, or a guinea pig if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Sus scrofa domesticus, or a domestic pig if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Bos taurus, or domestic cattle if you prefer English.
